questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A vehicle
C) A sign
D) A building

What is the primary message of the sign in the photo?
A) No parking
B) Be careful, slippery when wet
C) No entry
D) Danger, high voltage

What colors are prominently used in the sign?
A) Blue and white
B) Red, white and Black
C) Green and white
D) Yellow and black

What is the background of the photo?
A) A clear blue sky
B) A busy street
C) A wet and muddy surface
D) A grassy field

What is the purpose of the sign?
A) To provide directions
B) To warn about a hazard
C) To advertise a product
D) To give instructions

What is the state of the ground around the sign?
A) Dry and clean
B) Wet and muddy
C) Covered in snow
D) Covered in leaves

What is the shape of the sign?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Rectangular
D) Oval

What does the red section of the sign say?
A) Danger
B) Be careful
C) Stop
D) Warning

What does the black section of the sign say?
A) No entry
B) Slippery when wet
C) Caution
D) No parking

What is the overall tone of the message on the sign?
A) Informative
B) Cautionary
C) Friendly
D) Commanding

What is the condition of the surface around the sign?
A) Clean and dry
B) Wet and muddy
C) Covered in leaves
D) Covered in snow

What is the main color of the text on the sign?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Black and White
D) Yellow

How many screws are visible on the sign?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the condition of the screws on the sign?
A) Rusty
B) Shiny and new
C) Painted
D) Missing

What type of warning does the sign provide?
A) Electrical hazard
B) Slippery surface
C) Falling objects
D) No trespassing

What is the sign's message intended to prevent?
A) Theft
B) Accidents
C) Pollution
D) Noise

What is the font style of the text on the sign?
A) Cursive
B) Bold and blocky
C) Italic
D) Handwritten

What is the main visual contrast in the sign?
A) Red, Black and White
B) White and blue
C) Red and white
D) Black and yellow

What element of the sign is most emphasized?
A) The color and text
B) The text
C) The shape
D) The material

How does the condition of the sign affect its readability?
A) It is unreadable
B) Dirty but readable
C) It is clear and easy to read
D) It is partially obscured

What part of the sign is most damaged?
A) Top left corner
B) Bottom right corner
C) Center
D) Edges

What is the primary action the sign is advising?
A) Stop
B) Be cautious
C) Move quickly
D) Ignore

What is the visibility of the sign in the current conditions?
A) Highly visible
B) Moderately visible
C) Poorly visible
D) Not visible at all

What is the likely consequence of ignoring the sign's warning?
A) Getting lost
B) Slipping and falling
C) Getting a fine
D) Being arrested

What is the main hazard indicated by the sign?
A) Electrical shock
B) Slippery surface
C) Falling objects
D) Restricted access

What is the main action the sign is advising people to take?
A) Stop
B) Be careful
C) Move quickly
D) Ignore

What does the sign in the photo say?
A) No Trespassing
B) Keep Out
C) Be Careful Slippery When Wet
D) Danger High Voltage

What is the primary color of the text "BE CAREFUL" on the sign?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) White

What is the primary color of the text "SLIPPERY WHEN WET" on the sign?
A) Black
B) White
C) Yellow
D) Red

What is the condition of the sign in the photo?
A) New and clean
B) Old and dirty
C) Broken and unreadable
D) Covered in graffiti

Where might you commonly find such a sign?
A) In a shopping mall
B) In a park
C) Near a wet or slippery area
D) Inside a house
